summary: Thugs sneak into Hong Kong to rob a jewellery store, killing a cop during their getaway. They plan another heist while hiding from the police hunting them down to avenge their slain comrade.
cast: Jing Chen|Ling Chow|Jian Huang|Lung Jiang|Ben Lam|Wai Lam|James Mou|Wai Shum|Kwong Leung Wong|Ming Yeung
title: Sang gong kei bing
